StimulusPresentation.StimulusOnsetSync: Trigger pulse from scanner via parallel port
StimulusPresentation.ExternalDevices: A 27×27 mm² surface thermode (PATHWAY CHEPs, Medoc Ltd, Ramat Yishai, Israel)

Levels.rating: Pain intensity or unoleasantness rating period

UpR.Description: Unpleasantness rating reported by the participant

PR.Description: Pain intensity rating reported by the participant
